name: Brick Hill Halloween Theme w/ new bh style
description: The Brick Hill Halloween theme but with a twist! It is using the updated brick hill website design language!

user.name: t.co on Brick Hill
user.about: I like making custom themes for brick hill!

additional_info:
v.1.3:
- Banned, Terms of Service and Privacy Policy have been changed to match everything else.

v1.2:
- "Staff" page now has updated styling to match everything else

v1.1:
- Game titles are no longer in all caps on game viewing page
- Create new thread header is no longer in all caps
- Updated buttons in conspiracies subforum to match theme

v1.0.1:
- Post status button on Dashboard/Home page is now purple

v1.0:
- Release
